message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.NE, cs.IT. 

The paper proposes a novel approach for feature selection using neural networks and conditional mutual information estimation. This falls under the broad category of machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The use of neural networks for feature mapping suggests a potential application in computer vision (cs.CV) and the focus on conditional independence testing suggests a connection to information theory (cs.IT). Finally, the use of the $k$-NN estimator suggests a potential connection to neural networks (cs.NE).
